nodes.text: Sector 3 was a location in the western outskirts on the planet Ryloth. Shortly after the formation of the Galactic Empire, an Imperial convoy carrying Twi'lek prisoners including General Cham Syndulla's daughter Hera passed through Sector 3 on its way to Lessu, the capital city. The convoy was attacked before it reached its destination, as Cham and his wife Eleni hoped to rescue the captives.
